channel.title: [317] Compiler error
channel.description:
Can anyone please help me with this error ? :
[code]Player.java:14: illegal start of type */ ^ Player.java:14: ';' expected */ ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue[/code]

item.title: [317] Compiler error

item.description:

import java.util.Calendar; import java.util.GregorianCalendar; import javax.swing.Action; import javax.swing.Timer; /** ** Player Class **/ public abstract class Player implements Constants { public int WillKeepAmt1,WillKeepAmt2,WillKeepAmt3,WillKeepAmt4,WillKeepItem1,WillKeepItem2,WillKeepItem3,WillKeepItem4,WillKeepItem1Slot,WillKeepItem2Slot,WillKeepItem3Slot,WillKeepItem4Slot,EquipStatus; public Action pickupPenAction; public Action cantLeavePenAction; public Timer pickupPenTimer; public Timer cantLeavePenTimer; /** ** Dueling Stuff ** When adding a /* You must finish with a */ **/ public boolean duelAccept2 = false; public int[] duelButtons = { 26069, 26070, 26071, 30136, 2158, 26065, 26072, 26073, 26074, 26066, 26076, 53245, 53250, 53252, 53246, 53247, 53248, 53254, 53255, 53253, 53249, 53251 }; public boolean[] duelItemsNoted = new boolean[28]; public int[] duelLine = { 6698, 6699, 6697, 7817, 669, 6696, 6701, 6702, 6703, 6704, 6731 }; public String[] duelNames = { "No Ranged", "No Melee", "No Magic", "No Specials", "Fun Weapons", "No Forfeit", "No Drinks", "No Food", "No prayer", "No Movement", "Obstacles" }; public int duelpartner = 0; public boolean duelReq = false; public boolean duelRequested = false, inDuel = false, duelConfirmed = false, duelConfirmed2 = false, duelResetNeeded = false, duelFight = false; public int duelWho = 0; public int duel_with = 0; public long agilitytimer; public int aStage; public boolean duelAccept1 = false; public int DuelTimer = 8; public boolean wonDuel = false; public int DuelHasStarted = 0; //end of dueling shit public boolean isMoving = false; public int donateStatus; public long lastTeleport; public int clueKill; public boolean ddsHit; public int clueLevel; public int muteTime; public int publicChat, privateChat, tradeCompete; public int fishID; public String clanChan = ""; public boolean froze; public long buyTimer;

item.title: [317] Compiler error
item.dc:creator: @fuckedup111 fuckedup111
item.description:
@fuckedup111 wrote:

[quote=“David The Drummer, post:4, topic:374537”]post the code you’re getting the error from.[/quote]What do you mean ? ;o

You mean something like this ?

[code]import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;
import javax.swing.Action;
import javax.swing.Timer;

public abstract class Player implements Constants {
public int WillKeepAmt1,WillKeepAmt2,WillKeepAmt3,WillKeepAmt4,WillKeepItem1,WillKeepItem2,WillKeepItem3,WillKeepItem4,WillKeepItem1Slot,WillKeepItem2Slot,WillKeepItem3Slot,WillKeepItem4Slot,EquipStatus;
public Action pickupPenAction;
public Action cantLeavePenAction;
public Timer pickupPenTimer;
public Timer cantLeavePenTimer;
//dueling variables/*

/;
public boolean duelAccept2 = false;
public int[] duelButtons = { 26069, 26070, 26071, 30136, 2158, 26065,
26072, 26073, 26074, 26066, 26076, 53245, 53250, 53252, 53246, 53247, 53248, 53254, 53255, 53253, 53249, 53251 };
public boolean[] duelItemsNoted = new boolean[28];
public int[] duelLine = { 6698, 6699, 6697, 7817, 669, 6696, 6701, 6702,
6703, 6704, 6731 };
public String[] duelNames = { “No Ranged”, “No Melee”, “No Magic”,
“No Specials”, “Fun Weapons”, “No Forfeit”, “No Drinks”,
“No Food”, “No prayer”, “No Movement”, “Obstacles” };
public int duelpartner = 0;
public boolean duelReq = false;
public boolean duelRequested = false, inDuel = false,
duelConfirmed = false, duelConfirmed2 = false,
duelResetNeeded = false, duelFight = false;
public int duelWho = 0;
public int duel_with = 0;
public long agilitytimer;
public int aStage;
public boolean duelAccept1 = false;
public int DuelTimer = 8;
public boolean wonDuel = false;
public int DuelHasStarted = 0;
//end of dueling shit
public boolean isMoving = false;
public int donateStatus;
public long lastTeleport;
public int clueKill;
public boolean ddsHit;
public int clueLevel;
public int muteTime;
public int publicChat, privateChat, tradeCompete;
public int fishID;
public String clanChan = “”;
public boolean froze;
public long buyTimer;/*
[/code]
